<script>
	$('.watchVideo').click(function(){
		openVideo($(this).attr('href'))
		return false;
	})
	function openVideo(id){
		$('body').append('<div id="pop_exhi">'+
			'<iframe width="100%" height="100%" src="//www.youtube.com/embed/'+id+'?autoplay=1" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>'+
		'</div>'+
		'<div id="copri_tutto"></div>');
		$('#pop_exhi').show('slow')
		$('#copri_tutto').fadeIn('slow')
		$('#copri_tutto').click(function(){
			$('#pop_exhi').fadeOut('slow',function(){$(this).remove()})
			$('#copri_tutto').fadeOut('slow',function(){$(this).remove()})
		})
	}
</script>
        </div>
        <div id="footer">
            
        </div>
    
    <script>
    	$('.carica_sez').each(function(index, val) {
			$(this).load("http://www.likebikemc.com//caricaPage.php?sez="+$(this).attr('sez'));
		});

		$.backstretch([
			"http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home01.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home02.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home03.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home04.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home05.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home06.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home07.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home08.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home09.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home10.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home11.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home12.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home13.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home14.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home15.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home16.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home17.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home18.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home19.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home20.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home21.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home22.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home23.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home24.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home25.jpg","http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/home_gallery/home26.jpg"		], {duration: 5000, fade: 750});

		$('#schedule_img').backstretch("http://www.likebikemc.com/immagini/schedule.jpg");
		
		$( window ).resize(function() {
			resizeDoc()
		})
		function resizeDoc(){
			$(".full_page").height($(window).height())
			$('#schedule_img').backstretch("resize")	
			$('#cont_niterace').backstretch("resize")
		}
		resizeDoc()
		$('#primo_menu a').click(function(){
			if($(this).attr('href').search("#")){
				
				hash=$(this).attr('href').split('#')[1]
				
				scrollTo(hash)
	    		return false;
			}
		})
		var scrollActive=true;
		scrollTo(window.location.hash.replace('#', ''))
		function scrollTo(hash){
			if(hash){
				scrollActive=false
				offs=$('#contpag li[sez="'+hash+'"]').offset()
				
				$("html, body").animate({ scrollTop: offs.top-41 },500,function(){
	    			scrollActive=true
	    			window.location.hash=hash;
	    		});
			}
		}
		$(window).scroll(function (event) {	
					
			    var scroll = $(window).scrollTop();

			    var el=$('#primo_menu a.active')
			    var	hash=el.attr('href').split('#')[1]
			    var offs=$('#contpag li[sez="'+hash+'"]').offset()
			    var heightActive=offs.top+$('#contpag li[sez="'+hash+'"]').height()-42;
			    
				if(scroll>heightActive){
					$('a',el.parent().prev()).addClass('active')
					hash=$('a',el.parent().prev()).attr('href').split('#')[1]
					el.removeClass('active')
					if(scrollActive){
					window.location.hash=hash;
					}
				}else if(scroll<offs.top-45){
					$('a',el.parent().next()).addClass('active')
					hash=$('a',el.parent().next()).attr('href').split('#')[1]
					el.removeClass('active')
					if(scrollActive){
					window.location.hash=hash;
					}
				}
			
		});
		slide=true
		$(document).on('click','.frSlide_dx',function(){
			if(slide){
				ul=$('ul',$(this).prev());
				//alert((ul.width()-ul.parent().width()))
				if(-parseInt(ul.css('left'))<(ul.width()-ul.parent().width())-100){
					slide=false;
					ul.animate({
						left:"-="+($('li',ul).width()+parseInt($('li',ul).css('marginRight')))*3
					},'slow',function(){
						slide=true
					})
				}
			}
			return false;
		})
		$(document).on('click','.frSlide_sx',function(){
			if(slide){
				ul=$('ul',$(this).next());
				if(parseInt(ul.css('left'))<0){
					slide=false;
					ul.animate({
						left:"+="+($('li',ul).width()+parseInt($('li',ul).css('marginRight')))*3
					},'slow',function(){
						slide=true
					})
				}
			}
			return false;
		})

    </script>
</body>
</html>
